►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Microsoft announced it is resurrecting Windows Recall in October, Xiaomi's EV is a surprise success and a new MEMS base solid state cooling chip similar to Frore is announced by xMEMS.

Episode 211
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-microsoft-recall-is-back-from-the-dead

Windows 11 24H2 walkthrough by Windows Central https://youtu.be/iVtyb3VQQDs
